mapper.select: SELECT T1.MEMBER_EMAIL AS MEMBER_EMAIL , T1.MEMBER_PW AS MEMBER_PW, T1.MEMBER_NICK AS MEMBER_NICK, T1.MEMBER_BIRTH AS MEMBER_BIRTH, T1.MEMBER_PHONE AS MEMBER_PHONE , T1.BGIMG_SEQ AS BGIMG_SEQ, T2.BGIMG_PATH as BGIMG_PATH , T1.MEMBER_INTRO AS MEMBER_INTRO FROM MEMBER T1, BGIMAGE T2 WHERE T1.BGIMG_SEQ = T2.BGIMG_SEQ(+) AND T1.MEMBER_EMAIL = #{MEMBER_EMAIL}
